programme.title: Ip Man 2
programme.desc: International superstar Donnie Yen reprises his iconic role as the real-life kung fu grandmaster Ip Man. Master Ip, a new arrival in British-occupied Hong Kong, wants to open a martial arts academy to teach his unique Wing Chun style. A corrupt cabal of martial arts masters, led by Master Hung (Sammo Hung) refuses to allow him to teach in peace until he proves himself in a series of fights against the local master, which Ip does, in style. But even after earning the respect of the local masters, Ip’s troubles are far from over. Hong Kong under British rule is a new world of corruption and conflict between the Chinese locals and the British expats that run the city. When a Western-style boxer named “Twister” (Darren Shahlavi) comes to town to entertain the Brits, he insults Chinese martial arts in a horrifically violent way, and Ip is forced by honor to enter a brutal “King of the Ring” boxing match against Twister- and it’s East versus West in an amazing, knock-down drag-out fight to the finish.

programme.title: Half of a Yellow Sun
programme.desc: Olanna (Thandie Newton) and Kainene (Anika Noni Rose) are glamorous twins from a wealthy Nigerian family. Upon returning to a privileged city life in newly independent 1960s Nigeria after their expensive English education, the two women make very different choices. Olanna shocks her family by going to live with her lover, the “revolutionary professor” Odenigbo (Chiwetel Ejiofor) and his devoted houseboy Ugwu (John Boyega) in the dusty university town of Nsukka; Kainene turns out to be a fiercely successful businesswoman when she takes over the family interests, and surprises even herself when she falls in love with Richard (Joseph Mawle), an English writer.

programme.title: A Second Chance
programme.desc: When best friends Daniella and Cheyann both start to have feelings for Cheyann's best guy friend Darius, something unexpected happens. Faced with the possibility of losing Darius to Daniella makes Cheyanne realize that she really loves him causing the friends to be caught in a triangle of confusion, deceit and decisions.

programme.title: Laffapalooza Vol 1
programme.desc: Jamie Foxx presents Showtime's funny Laffapalooza program spotlighting the comic gifts of several of the host's peers and friends. While the show's format can get in the way of its purpose--there are too many testimonials between acts about the rough road of stand-up comedy--the performers generally.

programme.title: Laffapalooza Vol 2
programme.desc: Live from Atlanta, Jamie Foxx hosts this hilarious series of comedy specials. Watch some of the newest, hottest comics in action in the series that is sure to keep you laughing from start to finish! Starring comedians like Chris Thomas, T.K. Kirkland, Corey Holcomb, and David Grier make your stomach hurt with your heart pounding with joy.

programme.title: Laffapalooza Vol 3
programme.desc: We are back again with Jamie Foxx Laffapalooza 3 introducing more and more comedians that Jamie Foxx personally picked out himself. Showing Sheryl Underwood, Aries Spears, Chris Spencer, and Kenny Howell.

programme.title: Baselines
programme.desc: Set in Los Angeles, this series follows Jamiel Chambers, a blue chip high-schooler on the brink of escaping the desperate poverty that has berated inner city America. After his junior year ends with him leading his team to a second place finish in the state's regional tournament, Jamiel is hand-picked to play in the city's annual summer league All-Star game. With college recruits swarming and pro agents hedging, the media circus leans in, peddling the question mark around his future like rabid bookies. It is this exposure that gets the attention of Nick Collins, a derelict from a disreputable family from neighboring Irvine. After his doomed-from-the-start plan to capitalize on Jamiel's notoriety ends in with fatal results, family members from both sides are pulled into a series of events which will not only effect Jamiel's trajectory, but will set up one of the most intense family feuds the city has ever witnessed.

programme.title: Baselines
programme.desc: Season Finale! Mia confesses to Milk, as he discovers Jamiel was present during Nicky’s demise. Jamiel and Tareek visit an Ivy-prep League basketball coach who wants Jamiel to transfer for the betterment of his future.

programme.title: Pump
programme.desc: After scandal tears down his health supplements empire, TV fitness guru Sean Ford (Ray J) goes back to the modest LA gym where he began, desperate to rebuild his life.

programme.title: Pump
programme.desc: After scandal tears down his health supplements empire, TV fitness guru Sean Ford (Ray J) goes back to the modest LA gym where he began, desperate to rebuild his life.

programme.title: 4th & Forever
programme.desc: Meet the DeSoto Eagles, a dominant Texas high school football team—and the pride and joy of an upper-middle-class Dallas suburb affectionately known as 'the new Black Wall Street'.

programme.title: 4th & Forever
programme.desc: The momentum builds as the Eagles generate their first win of the season against non-district opponent Bowie. While definitely a confidence booster, the takeaways aren’t entirely positive.

programme.title: 4th & Forever
programme.desc: Archrival Duncanville will be coming to Eagles Stadium this upcoming Friday, and the stakes are high. As the top two teams in the 'District of Doom,'' the district championship is most likely on the line.

programme.title: 4th & Forever
programme.desc: After the crushing loss to District rival Duncanville, the team is in disarray. There is a clear disconnect between players and coaches that needs to be addressed for this team to reach the elite level.

programme.title: Brothers from the Suburbs
programme.desc: Three African American teenagers stumble through adolescence in their predominantly white private school community.

programme.title: Brothers from the Suburbs
programme.desc: The brothers' sacred ritual of Black Movie Night takes a dark turn when a quest for love puts Bone in a situation he can't quite Get Out of.

programme.title: Brothers from the Suburbs
programme.desc: The Brothers journey to Chicago for haircuts and dating advice. They will quickly find out that these barbers might be the wrong dudes to talk to.

programme.title: Black & Privileged
programme.desc: When low-income families move into a thriving black community in Chicago, they find themselves at odds with politicians to maintain their status
